flavorText: Now you see it, now you're gone.

foreignData.flavorText: Kaum ist es da, schon bist du weg.
foreignData.name: Leerer Schleicher
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Lege den Leeren Schleicher und eine Kreatur deiner Wahl oben auf die Bibliothek ihrer Besitzer; diese Spieler mischen dann ihre Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText: Ahora lo ves y ahora desapareces.
foreignData.name: Acechador del vacío
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Pon el Acechador del vacío y la criatura objetivo en la parte superior de las bibliotecas de sus propietarios, luego esos jugadores barajan sus bibliotecas.

foreignData.name: Pisteur du vide
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T} : Mettez le Pisteur du vide et la créature ciblée au-dessus des bibliothèques de leurs propriétaires. Ces joueurs mélangent ensuite leurs bibliothèques.

foreignData.flavorText: Ora lo vedi, ora non ci sei più.
foreignData.name: Errante del Vuoto
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Metti l'Errante del Vuoto e una creatura bersaglio in cima ai grimori dei rispettivi proprietari, poi quei giocatori rimescolano i loro grimori.

foreignData.name: 虚無の忍び寄り
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。虚無の忍び寄りとそれをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上に置き、その後それらのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル

foreignData.flavorText: 그의 존재를 눈치챘다면 때는 이미 늦었다.
foreignData.name: 공허의 추적자
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T}: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 공허의 추적자와 그 생물을 각자 소유자의 서고 맨 위에 놓은 후 그 플레이어들은 서고를 섞는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Agora você vê, agora não vê mais.
foreignData.name: Espreitador do Vácuo
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Coloque Espreitador do Vácuo e a criatura alvo no topo do grimório dos respectivos donos. Depois, aqueles jogadores embaralham seus próprios grimórios.

foreignData.flavorText: Едва успеешь его увидеть, как тебе конец.
foreignData.name: Пустотелый Преследователь
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, {T}: положите Пустотелого Преследователя и целевое существо на верх библиотек их владельцев, затем те игроки тасуют свои библиотеки.

foreignData.flavorText: 现在你看到了，你也该走了。
foreignData.name: 虚空伏击客
foreignData.text: {2}{U}，{T}：将虚空伏击客与目标生物各置于其拥有者的牌库顶，然后这些牌手将其牌库洗牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 現在你看到了，你也該走了。
foreignData.name: 虛空伏擊客
foreignData.text: {2}{U}，{T}：將虛空伏擊客與目標生物各置於其擁有者的牌庫頂，然後這些玩家將其牌庫洗牌。

name: Void Stalker
originalText: {2}{U}, {T}: Put Void Stalker and target creature on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries.

rulings.text: You can activate Void Stalker’s ability targeting a creature you control, including Void Stalker itself. In that case, only you will shuffle your library.

If the target creature is an illegal target when the ability tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No creature will leave the battlefield and no library will be shuffled.
If Void Stalker leaves the battlefield before its ability resolves, the target creature will be shuffled into its owner’s library but Void Stalker will remain wherever it is.

text: {2}{U}, {T}: Put Void Stalker and target creature on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries.
